document_data.name: Create Talisman
document_data.mainbody: '''''Create talisman''''' was a spell unique to [[Maztica]], the pinnacle of the art of the magic-users called [[hishnashaper]]s and [[plumaweaver]]s.<ref>
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed such an artisan to create a talisman of [[hishna]] or [[pluma]], respectively, which were both a work of art and a [[magic item]]. It was exceptional also in the long time it required: from a quarter of a year to one and a half years to ''create a talisman of hishna'' and even one year longer to ''create a talisman of pluma''.
document_data.Components: Aside from [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, the artisan required the materials necessary to construct the talisman.
document_data.Uses:
* A ''[[talon of Zaltec]]'' was a [[jaguar]] claw enchanted with the '' create talisman'' spell.
* A ''[[plumastone]]'' was a piece of [[obsidian]] enchanted with the '' create talisman'' spell.
